document.full_text: a former minnesota nurse who coaxed two depressed people into committing suicide was sentenced on wednesday to serve four days in jail each year for a decade on the anniversaries of his victims' deaths.
document.title: judge sentences minnesota nurse who coaxed suicides
lines_and_colors: a former minnesota nurse who coaxed two depressed people into committing suicide was sentenced on wednesday to serve four days in jail each year for a decade on the anniversaries of his victims' deaths.
